newsitem.title: USA: Selfix Inc creates holding company structure.
newsitem.headline: Selfix Inc creates holding company structure.

text.p: Selfix Inc said Tuesday it will form a new corporate structure that creates a holding company called Home Products International Inc, effective today.
The company said Home Products will consist of Selfix and Shutters Inc, which has been a division of Selfix since 1986.
Home Products markets home organizational and home improvement products through discount chains, hardware stores and home centers.
Its shares were down 1/4 Tuesday afternoon at 11-3/4.
